# id: ConditionalGenericConverter -> boolean matches(TypeDescriptor sourceType, TypeDescriptor targetType)_
commentText: Should the converter from sourceType to targetType_currently under consideration be selected?_@param sourceType the type descriptor of the field we are converting from_@param targetType the type descriptor of the field we are converting to_@return true if conversion should be performed, false otherwise
